summary: Heavy armor now became realy expensive! It now have different quality levels, so it's not so easy to find good armor in loot.
descriptionHtml:
Heavy armor is extremely expensive outfit type. Producing of heavy armor needs a lot of time, resources and skills, so it just can't be so cheap as it is in game!  What is the point of crafting heavy armor if you get 50-100 septims of income at the end??
From now one heavy armor became  realy expensive! If you got it as a reward, found it in your adventures or just crafted it, you can gain a lot of money selling it to a merchant!

As the armor became more expensive, regular bandits and other criminal scum can't no longer have a good quality armor. So after you defeat him you will probably find some kind of rusty old armor on his body. Now you will need your speechraft skills to get good money from trader for it. If Your skill more than trader's skill, he may even not notice that this armor is not good.

[b][u][size=3]So what exactly this mod does:[/size][/u][/b]
[list]
[*][size=2]Makes every heavy armor in game much more expensive (You can modify it in MCM)
[/size]
[*][size=2]looted armor now have a different quality conditions wich depends on NPC's level
[/size]
[*][size=2]Only High level NPC can have upgraded armor ( even if it added by mods like loot and Degradation)
[/size]
[*][size=2]Traders will give you less money for armor with bad condition
[/size]
[*][size=2]Your speechcraft skill can help you to get more gold selling old armor, or even a full value if trader have bad trading skills.[/size]

[/list]
[b][u][size=3]Compatibility:[/size][/u][/b]

With everithing accept maybe Trade routs ( but notthing serious I think  - just ugly armor prices :) )

[b][u][size=3]Requirements:
[/size][/u][/b]
Legendary Skyrim (with all 3 DLC)
SkyUI
SKSE 1.7. +

And the last one - English is not my native language, so mod may have some mistakes and stylistic inaccuracies. Any help is welcome!
